name: Chainsaw Craft
description:
Carve out your greatest masterpieces and sell them on for a tidy profit!

Customers are queueing round the block to buy your sculptures so it’s time to get the gloves on and get to work!

Create amazing pieces of artwork from simple tree stumps that they’ll want to photograph and show to millions. Chop your wood in the forest into the right shape and then take it over to your workbench where you can sand, polish and paint it to match your customers needs. Make sure you get it right though as you don’t want your shop to be on the chopping block!

What are you waiting for? It’s time to get chopping and show off your skills, you’ve got customers waiting!

Chainsaw Craft features:
- Craft amazing pieces of art from scratch
- Use the finest wood from the forest behind your shop
- Add in the detail at your workbench to create a masterpiece
- Become the best craftsman in town!
